name: Mahjong World Contest
description: Join a Mahjong contest. Complete over 100 unique levels to gain experience and points. Improve your rank and progress.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or later Processor: 1500 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 1.0GB of video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or later Processor: 2000 MHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 1.0GB of video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 50 MB available space

reviews.review_text: there are other mahjong games on steam that really suck but not this one.  mahjong world contest is good, i like it a lot. this mahjong game is much more what i was looking for than others i have bought on steam.  it's simply a relaxing game with fairly easy goals (most of the time). exactly what i was looking for. i plan to spend many hours playing it.
